boardgame.name: Namiestnik
Panovník
Viceroy
Virrey
Наместник
總督
boardgame.description: Viceroy is a board game of bidding and resource management set in the fantasy universe of the famous Russian CCG Berserk. As the players struggle for control over the world of Laar, they recruit a variety of allies and enact various laws. These cards allow players to develop their state's military and magical might, increase their authority, and get precious gems they need to continue expanding their nation._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;As the game progresses, each player builds his own power pyramid using character and law cards. Each card has its own effect that depends on the level of the pyramid where the card is played. These effects may give more resources, more cards, or victory points. The player who has the most power points at the end of the game becomes the ruler of entire Laar and the winner!_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

listing.notes: English version, limited Essen print run. One corner of the box has some damage, from the company itself, see pictures. Otherwise complete and in pristine condition.

PRE-ORDER Viceroy and have it shipped to you as soon as the Kickstarter copies are delivered! NEW copy of Viceroy includes Kickstarter bonuses such as: -Playmat (not included in base game) -Improved gems (not included in base game) -Limited edition box art -Linen finish box and cards -Scoring pad -Unique art player screens -12 bonus/promo cards -and more! Viceroy will ship via FedEx Ground as soon as I receive it and includes tracking and insurance for a flat rate of $5 to continental United States addresses. If you are interested in shipment to Alaska, Hawaii, or internationally, please contact me first for a revised shipment quote.
Played 2 times, excellent condition! English version components with Russian box, purchased at Essen 2014.

New in shrink. Direct bank transfer is the best way to pay. Check out my other games to bundle an order and save on postage: https://www.boardgamegeek.com/geekmarket/user/Scholle I usually get the package in the post the day after purchase. I must emphasise that I take extra care to package in a sturdy box with packing protection, however I accept no responsibility for the package once it_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s in the hands of Auspost. If you have a wild postal contractor who likes to hurl boxes AFL style at your front door then please let me know to organise signature on delivery. (Likewise if you live in a building where you_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;re not prepared to take the risk of Auspost leaving a parcel at the front door.) All parcels come with a tracking number.
